additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: CHOCOLATE VARIETY PACK. INGREDIENTS: SUGAR, GLUCOSE SYRUP (SOURCES INCLUDE WHEAT), MILK SOLIDS, COCOA MASS, COCOA BUTTER, VEGETABLE OIL, VEGETABLE FAT, BARLEY MALT EXTRACT, PEANUTS, FLOUR (SOURCES INCLUDE WHEAT), EMULSIFIERS (SOY LECITHIN, 492), WHEAT GLUTEN, SALT, EGG WHITE, RAISING AGENTS (501, 500), PECTIN, FLAVOURS, GLAZING AGENT (903). MILK CHOCOLATE CONTAINS A MINIMUM OF 23% COCOA SOLIDS AND 21% MILK SOLIDS.

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: MARS CONTAINS: MILK, SOY, WHEAT, BARLEY, EGG. MAY BE PRESENT: PEANUTS AND TREE NUTS. MILKY WAY CONTAINS: MILK, SOY, WHEAT, BARLEY, EGG. MAY BE PRESENT PEANUTS AND TREE NUTS. SNICKERS CONTAINS: PEANUTS, MILK, SOY, EGG. MAY CONTAIN: TREE NUTS. MALTESERS CONTAIN: MILK, SOY, WHEAT, BARLEY, WHEAT GLUTEN. TWIX CONTAINS: MILK, SOY, WHEAT.

description: Mars Variety Chocolate Fun Size Share Bag 20 pieces
